subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Deanna Nolan scored 18 points and Katie Smith added 17 to help Detroit beat Indiana to take a 1-0 lead in their W.N.B.A. Eastern Conference playoff series.
snippet: Deanna Nolan scored 18 points and Katie Smith added 17 to help Detroit beat Indiana to take a 1-0 lead in their W.N.B.A. Eastern Conference playoff series.
